page.title: 17Continuation of page 16
page.content: relegated to the Second Division and ,like other English Clubs ,were banned from competing in Europe after the Brussels disaster. Ken Brown was a professional footballer until he went into coaching and management.He came to this area as assistant manager and took over as manager when John Bond moved to Manchester City in 1980. A rising star on the English tennis scene Amanda Brown,who often drives her mother to school,started playing tennis at 12 years of age at school and developed from there. The youngest member of the family,Kenny, also showed his sporting prowess while still at school.Perhaps one day his name will be as well-known , both locally and nationally,as his famous father and sister.
